svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="26.1.1"> <diagram id="C5RBs43oDa-KdzZeNtuy" name="Page-1"> <mxGraphModel dx="1062" dy="671" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="rRrF74JtmgaNKmRNmw6H-24" value="合法进程镜像" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="263" y="490" width="156" height="54" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rRrF74JtmgaNKmRNmw6H-25" value="空洞化内存区域" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="365" y="617" width="142" height="54" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rRrF74JtmgaNKmRNmw6H-26" value="恶意代码" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="469" y="490" width="124" height="54" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rRrF74JtmgaNKmRNmw6H-27" value="winlogon.exe" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="617" width="155" height="54" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rRrF74JtmgaNKmRNmw6H-28" value="新进程" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="298" y="743" width="78" height="54" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rRrF74JtmgaNKmRNmw6H-29" value="原始ntdll.dll" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="646" y="490" width="150" height="54" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rRrF74JtmgaNKmRNmw6H-30" value="Hooked API区域" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="650" y="617" width="142" height="54" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rRrF74JtmgaNKmRNmw6H-31" value="内存卸载" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;endArrow=block;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.22;entryY=-0.01;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" id="rRrF74JtmgaNKmRNmw6H-32" value="内存注入" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;endArrow=block;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.79;entryY=-0.01;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 154px; height: 1px; padding-top: 28px; margin-left: 105px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
